questions.question: Which planet has no moons?

answers.answer: Mercury has no moons.
Venus has no moons.

questions.question: Which planet has no atmosphere?

answers.answer: Mercury has no atmosphere.

questions.question: What is the biggest planet in out solar system?

answers.answer: Jupiter is the biggest planet in our solar system.

questions.question: What is the smallest planet in out solar system?

answers.answer: Mercury is the smallest planet in our solar system.

questions.question: Which planets are gas giants?

answers.answer: Jupiter is a gas giant and has no solid surface.
Saturn is a gas giant and has no solid surface.
Uranus is a gas giant and has no solid surface.
Neptune is a gas giant and has no solid surface.

questions.question: Which planets have a solid surface (terrestrial)?

answers.answer: Mercury has a solid surface.
Venus has a solid surface.
Earth has a solid surface.
Mars has a solid surface.

questions.question: Which planet has a molten metal core?

answers.answer: Mercury has a molten metal core.
Earth has a molten metal core.
Mars has a molten metal core.

questions.question: Which planet is an ice giant (has an ice core)?

answers.answer: Uranus is an ice giant (has an ice core).
Neptune is an ice giant (has an ice core).

questions.question: Which planet spins backwards?

answers.answer: Venus spins backwards, meaning the sun rises in the west and sets in the east.
Uranus spins backwards, meaning the sun rises in the west and sets in the east.

questions.question: Which planet rotates sideways?

answers.answer: The axis of rotation for Uranus is horizontal, so it rotates sideways.

questions.question: What is the windiest planet?

answers.answer: Neptune is the windiest planet, where the wind speed can be as fast as 2000 kilometers per hour.

questions.question: Which planet gets its color from iron minerals rusting (oxidizing)?

answers.answer: Mars is red because of iron minerals rusting (oxidizing)

questions.question: Which planet has two moons called Phobos and Deimos?

answers.answer: Mars has two moons called Phobos and Deimos.

questions.question: Which planet has a red spot that is a giant storm?

answers.answer: The red spot on Jupiter is actually a giant storm that has been going on for years.

questions.question: Which planet has 67 moons?

answers.answer: Jupiter has 67 moons.

questions.question: Which planet has 62 moons?

answers.answer: Saturn has 62 moons.

questions.question: Which planet is made of mostly hydrogen and helium?

answers.answer: Jupiter is made of mostly hydrogen and helium.
Saturn is made of mostly hydrogen and helium.
Uranus is made of mostly hydrogen and helium.
Neptune is made of mostly hydrogen and helium.

questions.question: Which gas planet is also made of water, ammonia and methane?

answers.answer: Uranus is also made of water, ammonia and methane.
Neptune is also made of water, ammonia and methane.
